    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_89506</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_89506</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Things needed in making and maintaining a compost heap</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sachen benötigten, wenn sie einen Mischunghaufen
bildeten und beibehielten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les choses ont eu besoin en faisant et en mettant
à jour un segment de mémoire de compost</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As coisas necessitaram em fazer e em manter um 
heap do compost</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le cose hanno avuto bisogno di nel fare e 
nell'effettuare un mucchio della composta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πράγματα που απαιτούνται στην παραγωγή και τη 
διατήρηση ενός σωρού λιπάσματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las cosas necesitaron en la fabricación y 
mantener de un montón del estiércol vegetal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations showing the things needed in making and maintaining a compost heap. Shown here are some materials that decay and do not decay.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compost heap</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">decay</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">soil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wastes</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Abbildungen benötigte das Zeigen
der Sachen, wenn es einen Mischunghaufen bildete und beibehielt. 
Hier gezeigt etwas Materialien daß Zerfall und verfallen nicht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de trois illustrations montrer les choses
a eu besoin en faisant et en mettant à jour un segment de mémoire de
compost. Montrés ici sont quelques matériaux 
qu'affaiblissement et ne se délabrent pas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três ilustrações mostrar as 
coisas necessitou em fazer e em manter um heap do compost. São 
mostrados aqui alguns materiais que deterioração e não deterioram.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre illustrazioni mostrare le 
cose ha avuto bisogno di nel fare e nell'effettuare un mucchio della 
composta. Sono indicati qui alcuni materiali che deperimento e 
non decadono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τα πράγματα 
που απαιτούνται στην παραγωγή και τη διατήρηση ενός σωρού 
λιπάσματος. Εμφανισμένα εδώ είναι μερικά υλικά που 
αποσυντίθενται και δεν αποσυντίθενται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ilustraciones mostrar las cosas 
necesitó en la fabricación y mantener de un montón del estiércol 
vegetal. Se muestran aquí algunos materiales que decaimiento y 
no se decaen.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Materialien</string>
